All Classes

Class Description
AccountType
Enum of the different account types.
AssetType
Creates a new instance of an asset.
ClientApp
Responsible for the Client application and its core processes.
ClientConfig
Responsible for setting, getting and saving the config relating to the Server's IP Address and Port number.
ConnectToTestDB  
DBConnection
Establishes a connection with the database.
GUIAdmin  
GUIHome
Constructs components to create the GUIHome page.
GUILogin
Responsible for the frontend and backend of the Client's Login.
GUIMain
The main GUI class.
GUIManager
Responsible for the frontend and backend of the Server's GUI.
GUIOrder
Constructs the Buy/Sell Trade Order popup as a JOptionPane.
GUIOrgHome
Constructs components to creates organisationalHome tab of the GUI.
GUIProfile  
GUITrade  
ITAdministrator
An IT Administrator is a user that has extra permissions to manage Organisational units and users.
JDBCAssetType
Retrieves data from AssetType table in database
JDBCOrganisationalAsset
Retrieves requested information from the OrganisationAsset table of the database
JDBCOrganisationalUnit
Retrieves data from OrganisationUnit table in database
JDBCThreadLock  
JDBCTradeDataSource
Retrieves information from the database relating to trade orders
JDBCTradeReconcileSource
Trade reconcile source is used to add records to the reconcile table, to retrieve reconcilable trade orders and to get historical asset trades (for historical sell price).
JDBCTradingPlatformDataSource  
JDBCUserDataSource
The JDBC user datasource is a class used to get a user's details from the database.
MockDatabaseFunctions
This class is used for created a test database with test data.
NetworkManager
Manages Client side of the network protocol.
NotifyingThread
Responsible for alerting the completion of threads that it stores.
OrganisationalAssetSource  
OrganisationalUnit
Creates a new instance of an organisational unit.
OrganisationalUnitServer
Creates a new instance of an organisational unit.
OrganisationalUnitSource  
OrganisationAsset
OrganisationAssets stores an asset owned by each OrganisationalUnit and records unique ID for this pair.
Request
Serialisable object used for communication between Client and Server.
ServerApp
Responsible for starting all of the Server's core processes and for gracefully shutting down the Server.
ServerConfig
Responsible for the backend of the Server GUI.
ServerHandle
A part of the Server side network protocol.
ServerSend
A part of the Server side network protocol.
SHA256
Hashes Strings and returns hashed Strings.
ThreadCompleteListener
Provides functionality of alerting thread completion.
Trade
Creates a new instance of either a BUY or SELL order for a trade
TradeDataSource  
TradeManager
TradeManager manages the listed trades
TradeOrder
This tradeorder class is an object that is just used to store information about a trade order, it does not interface the server or database in any way.
TradeRecon
This trade recon class is an object that is just used to store information about a trade reconciliation, it does not interface the server or database in any way.
TradeReconcile
Trade reconcile is used to reconcile all valid trades.
TradeReconcileSource  
TradingPlatformDataSource
Provides functionality needed by any data source for the Trading Platform application.
User
A user is a part of an organisational unit, and has their own username, password, and account type.
UserDataSource
